articles.author: Ashley Strickland and Jackie Wattles, CNN
articles.title: Artemis I's next launch attempt may not happen until later this year - CNN International
articles.description: A second attempt at launching the uncrewed Artemis I mission was scrubbed Saturday after experiencing fueling issues. Future launch attempts may not occur until later this year, like launch periods in September and October, according to an update from NASA.
articles.content: Kennedy Space Center, Florida (CNN)NASA will not pursue a launch of Artemis I for the remainder of the launch period, which ends on Tuesday, according to an update from the agency after a second scru… [+6862 chars]
